name: css-filter-contrast
description: Css module of single purpose classes for filter contrast

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-filter-contrast.css > css/css-filter-contrast.css && tachyons src/css-filter-contrast.css --minify > css/css-filter-contrast.min.css && tachyons src/css-filter-contrast.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
